import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function ScienceLabFormsModal() { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); return (
{/* Trigger Button */}
Science-Lab-Form

SCIENCE LABORATORY INSPECTION FORM

CONFIDENTIAL – FOR INTERNAL SAFETY USE

{/* SECTION 1: GENERAL INFORMATION */}

SECTION 1: GENERAL INFORMATION

{/* SECTION 2: LABORATORY SAFETY CHECKLIST */}

SECTION 2: LABORATORY SAFETY CHECKLIST

Mark each item: √ = Satisfactory ⨰ = Needs Attention N/A = Not Applicable

Use the “Comments” column to provide explanations or notes.

{[ { category: "General Housekeeping", items: [ "Lab clean and organized", "Floors dry and free from obstructions", "Work surfaces clean", "Adequate lighting", "Proper ventilation working" ] }, { category: "Chemical Safety", items: [ "Chemicals properly labeled", "Safety Data Sheets (SDS) available", "Chemicals stored correctly (secured, separated)", "Expired chemicals disposed appropriately" ] }, { category: "Emergency Equipment", items: [ "Fire extinguisher accessible and inspected", "Eye wash station operational and accessible", "Safety shower working (if available)", "First aid kit available and stocked", "Emergency exit clearly marked and unobstructed", "Emergency contact numbers posted" ] }, { category: "Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)", items: [ "Goggles available and in good condition", "Lab coats/aprons provided", "Gloves available in multiple sizes", "PPE storage area clean and organized" ] }, { category: "Electrical & Equipment Safety", items: [ "Equipment in good working order", "Power cords intact (no fraying)", "Circuit breakers accessible and labeled", "Gas valves shut off when not in use", "Fume hoods functional and tested" ] }, { category: "Waste Disposal", items: ["Chemical waste disposed of properly"] } ].map((section, idx) => (
